titleStmt.title: The warnings of the Lord to the King of England and his Parliament as they were wrote and sent by his servant, George Bishope.
titleStmt.author: Bishop, George, d. 1668.

notesStmt.note: Letters signed by George Bishope with date on which the original was delivered to the King. Some letters name the deliverers: Mary Saunderson, Mary Jones, Elizabeth Baily.
Reproduction of original in Hungtington Library.
